JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Giovanni Bonello;Ján Šikuta;Ledi Bianku;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: The applicant , Mr Özgür Akgöçmen , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent .

“ Where a public officer embezzles or converts to his own use money or documents or bills valued as money or other property instructed to him or under his custody , control or responsibility by virtue of his office , he shall be punished by heavy imprisonment of DATE ...

If the amount is paid in full by the offender before the commencement of the trial , the punishment stated in the previous paragraphs shall be reduced by CARDINAL ; if the amount is paid in full before the judgment is given , the punishment shall be reduced by CARDINAL .

“ Whoever , being a public officer , abuses his office in any manner other than described in the LAW , shall be punished by imprisonment for DATE , depending on the degree of the offence . Where matters of mitigating circumstances exist , the offender shall be punished by imprisonment of DATE and in both cases the offender shall be fined ... The offender shall be disqualified from holding public office temporarily or for life ” .
